input.sentences: [male] gives me a mean look as i begin to snap some pictures of the group .
a close up of one of my favorite pictures from the art gallery that we all visited .
as we walk down the hall [male] points out a rather interesting painting .
after hearing [male] [female] points out this very unique piece of art that is rather hard to follow .
the whole group works together to try to figure out the meaning behind the piece as [female] leans in for a closer look .
output.sentences: I felt I was about to snap surrounded by all these males staring at the pictures in my art gallery.
They only ever visited to see pictures of my work in the gallery.
They would walk around talking about the paintings and making a fuss about how my subjects were never male.
Each piece was unique, different, emotion evoking, but never... male.
They would still come, looking at each piece, deciphering the meaning, and I would watch them lean into my work as if it were just another wall, because they were never in my subjects.
